source.7c9cee8c:
_list3 = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,0,-123,-394,-319,9981,92839,8362]

_min = 0
_max = 0

_index = 0
_len = len(_list3)

while (_index < _len):
    _current = _list3[_index]
    
    if _current > _max:
        _max = _current
    
    if _current < _min:
        _min = _current
        
    _index = _index+1

print ("EN BÜYÜK SAYI : "  , _max)
print ("EN KÜÇÜK SAYI : " , _min)
